topics.body:
I hate it when you poop a lot.
It feels fulfilling but sometimes, I look back at my toilet, wondering if my poop was so huge that it clogged it up.

It didn't but god, the thought scares me.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
And I just found out why quicktime events are the fucking devil.

I'm legitimately stuck on a part in dead space because there's a gamebreaking bug in which I'm on the train but I've been doing the press E for the past half hour and it's not registering the input.

In other words quicktime events are the fucking devil because there's a chance that a small portion of your consumers will have their games completely unplayable cause it won't read your inputs.
